metadata.title: CVE-2021-47087 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: tee:optee: Fix incorrect page free bug Pointer to the allocated pages (structpage *page) has already progressed towards the end of allocation. It isincorrect to perform __free_pages(page, order) using this pointer as wewould free any arbitrary pages. Fix this by stop modifying the pagepointer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
